method.name: GetISO3Language
method.comment: Returns the three-letter ISO 639-2/T language code which corresponds to the language code for this Locale.

method.name: GetDefault
method.comment: Returns the user's preferred locale.

method.name: GetLanguage
method.comment: Returns the language code for this Locale or an empty string if no language was set.

method.name: GetAvailableLocales
method.comment: Returns the system's installed locales.

method.name: GetDisplayLanguage
method.comment: Equivalent to GetDisplayLanguage(Locale.GetDefault).

method.name: GetDisplayName
method.comment: Equivalent to GetDisplayName(Locale.GetDefault).

method.name: GetVariant
method.comment: Returns the variant code for this Locale or an empty String if no variant was set.

method.name: SetDefault
method.comment: Overrides the default locale. This does not affect system configuration, and attempts to override the system-provided default locale may themselves be overridden by actual changes to the system configuration. Code that calls this method is usually incorrect, and should be fixed by passing the appropriate locale to each locale-sensitive method that's called.

method.name: GetISO3Country
method.comment: Returns the three-letter ISO 3166 country code which corresponds to the country code for this Locale.

method.name: GetCountry
method.comment: Returns the country code for this locale, or an empty string if this locale doesn't correspond to a specific country.

method.name: GetDisplayCountry1
method.comment: Returns the name of this locale's country, localized to Locale1.

method.name: GetDisplayName2
method.comment: Returns this locale's language name, country name, and variant, localized to Locale1.

method.name: GetISOCountries
method.comment: Returns an array of strings containing all the two-letter ISO 3166 country codes that can be used as the country code when constructing a Locale.

method.name: GetDisplayLanguage2
method.comment: Returns the name of this locale's language, localized to Locale1.

method.name: GetISOLanguages
method.comment: Returns an array of strings containing all the two-letter ISO 639-1 language codes that can be used as the language code when constructing a Locale.

method.name: GetDisplayVariant
method.comment: Returns the full variant name in the default Locale for the variant code of this Locale.

method.name: GetDisplayCountry
method.comment: Equivalent to GetDisplayCountry(Locale.GetDefault).

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the Resources object. ResourceSource1 - Either RESOURCE_SOURCE_APPLICATION or RESOURCE_SOURCE_SYSTEM.

method.name: GetIdentifier
method.comment: Returns an integer resource identifier for the given resource name. A fully qualified resource name is of the form "package:type/entry". The first two components (package and type) are optional if ResourceType and DefaultPackage, respectively, are specified here. ResourceName - The name of the desired resource. ResourceType - Optional resource type to find, if "type/" is not included in the name. DefaultPackage - Optional default package to find, if "package:" is not included in the name. Returns 0 if no such resource was found. (0 is not a valid resource ID).

method.name: GetDimensionPixelOffset
method.comment: Retrieve a dimensional for the resource ID for use as an offset in raw pixels.

method.name: GetResourceNames
method.comment: Returns a List containing resource names. ResourceSource1 - Either RESOURCE_SOURCE_APPLICATION or RESOURCE_SOURCE_SYSTEM. ResourceType - The type of resources to return resource names for, eg "string" or "drawable".

method.name: OpenRawResource
method.comment: Open a data stream for reading a raw resource.

method.name: GetInteger
method.comment: Return an integer associated with the resource ID.

method.name: GetDrawableForDensity
method.comment: Return a drawable object associated with the resource ID for the given screen density in DPI.

method.name: SetDefaultLocale
method.comment: Set the default Locale used to get resources.

method.name: GetBoolean
method.comment: Return a boolean associated with the resource ID.

method.name: GetQuantityString
method.comment: Returns the string necessary for grammatically correct pluralization of the resource ID for the quantity.

method.name: GetStringArray
method.comment: Return the string array associated with the resource ID.

method.name: GetDimension
method.comment: Retrieve a dimensional for the resource ID.

method.name: GetResourceEntryName
method.comment: Return the entry name for the resource identifier.

method.name: GetString
method.comment: Return the string value associated with the resource ID. It will be stripped of any styled text information.

method.name: GetResourceTypeName
method.comment: Return the type name for the resource identifier.

method.name: GetIntArray
method.comment: Return the int array associated with the resource ID.

method.name: GetResourcePackageName
method.comment: Return the package name for the resource identifier.

method.name: GetResourceName
method.comment: Return the full name for the resource identifier.

method.name: GetColor
method.comment: Return a color integer associated with the resource ID.

method.name: GetDrawable
method.comment: Return a drawable object associated with the resource ID.

method.name: GetDimensionPixelSize
method.comment: Retrieve a dimensional for the resource ID for use as a size in raw pixels.

field.name: RESOURCE_SOURCE_SYSTEM
field.comment: Constant field used to reference the system's resources.

field.name: RESOURCE_SOURCE_APPLICATION
field.comment: Constant field used to reference the application's resources.

root.comment: Object for accessing application or system resources. http://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/res/Resources.html
root.author: Martin Pearman
